summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 11.1°C) and outside temperature (down 10.9°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 335 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 223 m), and outside humidity (down 5%) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; chilly temperatures are forecasted. Also, dry and less humid conditions and winds should remain light. Possible light showers, overcast skies with low cloud, and it’s dim outside. The weather will likely remain the same.
